lexUnit.name: embarrassing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing someone to feel ashamed, self-conscious or awkward

sentence.text: Governments have an ambivalent attitude towards defectors because although they recognise their information is of value , even though it may prove highly embarrassing , they dislike having to deal with traitors .
I was sitting there loving it until I uttered the most embarrassing words of my life .
